guiPackage

Class GuiActivitiesWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiPackage.GuiActivitiesWatcher

  • public class GuiActivitiesWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains reference to the activities performed in the GUIs, so it watches the GUIs and keep some unique records of what last activity happened by the user and which are shared between many of the GUI components
    Version:
    03/12/2016
    Author:
    Yahya Almardeny
